email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

I hope this email finds you well. We have the MV OCEAN STAR (DWT: 180,000, LOA: 300m) available for your iron ore shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao. The cargo size is 150,000MT on CIF terms. The starting freight quote is USD 18.50 per tonne. Laycan is 25-30 Oct. Please let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thank you for the offer. USD 18.50 seems a bit high compared to the current market rates. Can you do better? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

I can offer USD 18.00 per tonne. The demurrage rate is USD 25,000 per day. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

USD 18.00 is better. Can we push it to USD 17.75? Also, can we adjust the laycan to 27 Oct - 1 Nov?

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

USD 17.75 is possible. Laycan adjusted to 27 Oct - 1 Nov. Please confirm.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Confirmed. Please send the summary of terms.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Here's the summary:
- Vessel: MV OCEAN STAR
- Cargo: 150,000MT Iron Ore
- Load Port: Port Hedland
- Discharge Port: Qingdao
- Laycan: 27 Oct - 1 Nov
- Freight: USD 17.75 per tonne
- Demurrage: USD 25,000 per day
- Incoterm: CIF

Please confirm.

Best regards,
Alex
